a1: These fonts use special Unicode characters that look like different font styles. They are actual characters, not formatting, so they work anywhere text is supported.
q2: Will these fonts work on all platforms?
a2: Yes, since these are Unicode characters they work on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, WhatsApp, and any platform supporting Unicode.
a3: Some Unicode font styles may not be readable by screen readers. Use them sparingly for decorative purposes and keep important information in regular text.
